name: RetrieveBoxHubCollaborations
description:
Retrieves collaborations for a Box Hub.

This tool fetches all the collaborations associated with a given Box Hub. It should be called when there is a need to access or review the collaborative associations within a Box Hub.

parameters.name: hub_identifier
parameters.description: The unique string identifier for a Box Hub, found in the Hub's URL.

value_schema.description:
The unique identifier that represent a hub.

The ID for any hub can be determined
by visiting this hub in the web application
and copying the ID from the URL. For example,
for the URL `https://*.app.box.com/hubs/123`
the `hub_id` is `123`.

parameters.name: pagination_marker
parameters.description: The position marker to begin returning results, used for marker-based pagination. Ensure `usemarker` is set to `true`.

value_schema.description:
Defines the position marker at which to begin returning results. This is
used when paginating using marker-based pagination.

This requires `usemarker` to be set to `true`.

parameters.name: max_items_per_page
parameters.description: The maximum number of collaboration items to return per page. Determines the page size for results.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.
